lead_paragraph: The Lakers grabbed Walton just five days after they fired Byron Scott, who led the 16-time N.B.A. champions to the two worst seasons in franchise history.

headline.main: Luke Walton Agrees to Become Lakers’ Next Coach
headline.print_headline: Luke Walton Agrees to Become Lakers’ Next Coach

snippet: The Lakers grabbed Walton just five days after they fired Byron Scott, who led the 16-time N.B.A. champions to the two worst seasons in franchise history.
